resources.string: Currently the only device to run Android TV is the Nexus Player
Simple TV-style remote; with voice search hardware
Android app that interfaces Android TV over wifi
The docs are currently hit-or-miss. The high level style and design guidelines are great, but the source and javadocs on some methods are missing.
Google TV is not the same thing as Android TV. Google TV devices ran a customized verstion of Android (almost exclusively based on 3.2) Apps for Google TV are not available on Android TV
